basics.name: Julien Bisconti
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Software Engineer. Degree: Master in Computer Science (graduated 2007). 11 years in the workforce. Passionate about automation, DevOps, containers, the cloud, deployment and functional programming. Interested in contract work. Aspiring to be a Site Reliability Engineering (SRE). Polyglot in many programming languages: JavaScript, Go, Python, bash, Java, Clojure/ClojureScript and Haskell. Interested to work with technologies such as kubernetes, serverless, service mesh, microservices, open source, software engineering at scale.

work.summary: Cloud native, containerized environment. Content management (articles, shows, video, ...) for the entertainment industry
highlights: Using containers, testing & deploying with Jenkins to Kubernetes cluster running on AWS. Logs gather with ELK stack. Metrics with Prometheus.
Performance critical microservice written in Java 8 using Redis intensively (Redis cluster with Sentinel) as well as PostgreSQL and ElasticSearch, using VertX for service to service communication.
Single Page App for editors to manage content for the Europeans websites.

work.summary: Cloud native, containerized environment. Ads delivery business for the gaming industry
highlights: Using containers, testing & deploying with Jenkins to Kubernetes cluster running on AWS. Logs gather with ELK stack. Metrics with Prometheus.
Technical recruiter: Part of the recruitment process, review technical tests, conduct interview.
Performance critical microservices written in Golang. Using Redis as a cache. Using Nats to receive data from other microservices.

work.summary: Web development in Clojure and Clojurescript
highlights: Full stack web development in Clojure and ClojureScript using PostgreSQL as database.
Part of the project can be found on github https://github.com/veggiemonk/guestbook
Analysis, development, maintenance, support of Single Page Application with Redux + React, ES6+, JSX, SaSS, Mocha, Chai, Sinon, Localization: EN, FR, NL

Backend  written in Java 8 (Tomcat 8, JAX-RS, Hibernate, JUNIT) connecting to Oracle 11g, MySQL, cache (Redis) and a secure FTP server (proprietary) containing sensitive documents (accounting, payroll, salary, ...)
Important security considerations about software development on the web.

work.summary: Teaching DevOps and Agile methodology to developers to improve critical production services (payroll) reliability
highlights: Building a whole CI/CD pipeline with Jenkins (Java app), Gitlab-CI (Javascript) and custom application (node.js) while introducing git
Gather logs and statistics from web applications and servers + alerting developers (email only) when a customer has an error.
Presentations to teams, Code quality check with SonarQube, writing reports for conferences, meetings, projects requirements analysis.

work.summary: Server operations. Developing web and mobile solutions. Full stack developer Java/JavaScript
highlights: Startup experience, lots of technology assessment and technical business analysis.
Web Development with  Node.js/Express, Python programming, mobile application development with GoogleWebToolkit GWT.
Linux Server administration, lots of self hosted solution.

work.summary: Master thesis over the MPLS protocol (data layer 2). Network server operations. Linux kernel programming
highlights: Linux Kernel Module development in C with mpls-linux (https://sourceforge.net/projects/mpls-linux/‎)
Advanced Bash scripting
Advanced Networking in Linux Kernel with QoS and various queue model (such as Weighted Fair Queuing)
Network load testing with tc (traffic control command), iptables, quagga, tcpdump.
Virtualization of Network with Linux Containers (Netkit http://wiki.netkit.org) with LXC
